page.title: 02Motor Mechanic-Thorpe Salvin
page.content: My dad is an{Agricultural Engineer in Thorpe Salvin. He works in his workshop next to our house where he mends{vehicles,}some of which are brought in from Germany and France.In the{workshop}is a six foot crane, a welding torch for metal, a paint stripper and a sander that sands down body filler. My brother, who is fourteen, and I both help my dad sometimes when we are not at school. My dad is supplied with the{cars}to repair, respray and test and then they can be sold. He works mainly on Ford Escorts and Cortinas, or Land Rovers. We have fourteen vehicles in our yard as well as a scrap heap and a store for spares. We have two vehicles, a Thames 15cwt.van and a 100E Ford Anglia,which we are preparing to show at{Vintage Motor Shows and Rallies.
